mapper.select: select * from reply where seq=#{seq} order by reseq desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply(seq, reseq, writer, content, image1, image2, image3, image4) values(#{seq},(select nvl(max(reseq), 0)+1 from reply),#{writer},#{content},#{image1},#{image2},#{image3},#{image4})
mapper.update: update reply set content=#{content}, image1=#{image1}, image2=#{image2}, image3=#{image3}, image4=#{image4} where reseq=#{reseq}
